summary: Nephrology is a medical specialty that focuses on the kidneys. It involves studying how kidneys work, kidney diseases, and how to keep kidneys healthy. Doctors who specialize in this field are called nephrologists. They treat kidney problems with diet changes, medicine, or even kidney transplants. The term "nephrology" is derived from the Greek word for kidney. It was officially named in the 1960s, but doctors have been treating kidney issues for much longer.
title: Nephrology
